job_description:
Welcome to Crown Castle International! We are a leading provider of wireless infrastructure solutions, connecting people and businesses across the nation. As a Data Engineer - Network, you will play a crucial role in our success by designing, developing, and maintaining our network data systems. We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated individual with a strong background in data engineering and network technologies. If you are passionate about utilizing data to drive business decisions and thrive in a fast-paced, collaborative environment, we encourage you to apply for this exciting opportunity.

Design, develop, and maintain network data systems to support business operations and decision making.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data needs and requirements.
Develop and implement data pipelines and ETL processes to ensure efficient and accurate data flow.
Optimize and troubleshoot existing data systems to ensure maximum efficiency and accuracy.
Perform data analysis and develop visualizations to communicate key insights to stakeholders.
Ensure data quality and integrity through rigorous testing and validation processes.
Keep up-to-date with industry trends and advancements in data engineering and network technologies.
Collaborate with team members to continuously improve and innovate data engineering processes and systems.
Communicate regularly with stakeholders to gather feedback and provide updates on project progress.
Identify and implement solutions to improve data storage, retrieval, and processing capabilities.
Stay organized and document processes, systems, and changes for future reference.
Adhere to company policies and procedures, including data security and privacy standards.

Crown Castle International is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
